1087740.name: Splitgate: Arena Warfare - Founder's Edition
1087740.description:
Enter the arena in STYLE with the Splitgate: Arena Warfare Founder's Edition.

Founder's Edition EXCLUSIVE Armor Set: Dweller

Dweller armor is EXCLUSIVE to those who support the Splitgate: Arena Warfare developers by purchasing the Founder's Edition. This set is the ONLY launch-EXCLUSIVE armor set. The Dweller set is best described as: "If aliens were gladiators and gladiators were from the future."

Four Additional Dweller Skins

Atlantis - Legendary
- Description: alternates colors over time.
- Perfect for players who DO THE MOST.
*Shown in above image

Camo - Legendary
- Description: camo that moves on the armor as the user is wearing it.
- Ideal for those who like modern twists on classics.

Blaze - Epic
- Description: bronze, battle-worn armor.
- Only for those who boast about their successes in the arena.

Default Blue Skin - Common
-Description: - blue.
-If you want to be blue.
*This skin is blue.

Founder's Edition EXCLUSIVE Weapon Skin

The "Full" weapon skin is EXCLUSIVE to those who support the Splitgate: Arena Warfare developers by purchasing the Founder's Edition. You get the Full weapon skin for all weapons!

Full - Epic

Bonus Two EXCLUSIVE "Founders" Sprays

Represent the Splitgate founding developers by spraying their faces around the maps!

Notes:
-All unlockables in Splitgate: Arena Warfare will be cosmetic enhancements and will absolutely NOT affect gameplay.
-The Founder's Edition can only be purchased once per account.
1087740.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
